channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Easy Form Builder
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Easy Form Builder

item.title: CVE-2022-3906|2024-08-03T01:20:58.477Z -- unknown -- easy%20form%20builder
item.description: The Easy Form Builder WordPress plugin before 3.4.0 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup).

item.title: CVE-2021-24224|2024-08-03T19:21:18.637Z -- unknown -- easy%20form%20builder
item.description: The EFBP_verify_upload_file AJAX action of the Easy Form Builder WordPress plugin through 1.0, available to authenticated users, does not have any security in place to verify uploaded files, allowing low privilege users to upload arbitrary files, leading to RCE.
